description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，中国人民武装警察部队少将警衔。历任广东省政协常委、中共十九大代表、中国人民武装警察部队广东省总队司令员、武警8630部队师长等职务。
description.en: Member of the Communist Party of China, holding the rank of Major General in the People's Armed Police Force. He has served as a Standing Committee member of the Guangdong Provincial Political Consultative Conference, a delegate to the 19th National Congress of the CPC, Commander of the Guangdong Provincial Corps of the People's Armed Police Force, and Division Commander of the PAPF 8630 Unit.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.
